title: Will need someone tech savvy with websites
job_overview:
I need help with a little project. Does take like 5 min if you know what to do. I want to put my already made hugging face website and add a domain to it. I have searched a bit on my own and I think you have to use a index.html file and paste it into netlify or something. Just a hosting software.

Should not be to hard.

Please only reply if you understand the problem and know how to do it. Please respond with a 30 second loom telling me about yourself and if you think you know how to do it. This is just a 1 time project. When you figuired it out I would also like to know how you did it.
